name: EPK Canyon
description:
Introduction

Featuring a big clean drop with a view!

Approach

Drop your shuttle car at the Sterling Pass TH and head over to AB Young to start your hike.

Descent

R1: 30’ juniper in watercourse

R2: 310’ pine DCL

R3: 100’ rock pinch

R4: 90’ tree then downclimb slope on DCL

R5: 20’ tree

R6: 75’ tree

Exit

Continue following drainage for a ways until you come to another drop with no anchor. Stop, check map, turn left and head up faint trail. Follow faint trails over to Sterling Pass and out!

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.3881115835242161&type=3

Background

Although an FD was claimed there were no anchors or signs of a previous descent. We built anchors at all rappel stations.
